edu.umich.auth.cosign
Class CosignServer

java.lang.Object
  edu.umich.auth.cosign.CosignServer
public class CosignServer
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a Cosign server. It also configures its corresponding connection pool.

Author:
htchan
